Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $619.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:41:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MINISFORUM Mini PC UM580

AMD Ryzen 7 5800H, 8 Cores/16 ThreadsAMD Radeon Graphics (Graphics Frequency 2000 MHz)DDR4 8GB ×2 Dual channelM.2 2280 512GB PCIe SSD1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot (SATA 3.0 6.0Gb/s)M.2 2230 WIFI Support

Dual HDMI & 2 x USB-C Video Outputs

Upgraded friendly

UM580 mini computer comes with M.2 2280 512GB PCle SSD.UM580 uses DDR4, dual SODIMM memory technology, which significantly improves the transmission speed and efficiency, reduces power consumption compared to DDR3. It comes with Dual channel and support maximum expansion to 64GB RAM.It’s expandable with the addition of up to 2 TB of 2.5-inch SSD or HDD[NOT INCLUDED].

Display ALT-Mode

One of the USB-C port on the back of the computer supports ALT-Mode. Alt-Mode allows USB-C ports to transfer video via multiple interfaces, including the increasingly popular DisplayPort video interface.

Data

DisplayPort and USB interfaces share connectors. This feature opens up more possibilities for DisplayPort applications. For example, mobile phones can easily connect to peripherals such as mice, keyboards, and screens, just like a computer host in your pocket.

USB Power Delivery

If the monitor support USB PD (USB Power Delivery), users can use this port to power the computer and transfer video signal to the monitor at the same time which makes the whole setup cleaner.

Portable Mini PC

Mini PCs are not only mini-sized, but also powerful and space-saving. The wall mount bracket easily attaches to the back of the monitor. You can take it with you when you are traveling, meeting or speaking. Bring convenience to your life.

Multiple Application Options

Great choice for multiple commercial and industrial network activities, like Server, POS, Monitor, TV, Printer, Projector.Very nice idea as a gift for Children, Parent and friends.

Package

1 * MINISFORUM UM5801 * Power Adapter1 * HDMI Cable (60cm)1 * Mounting Bracket1 * User Manual1 * Computer Stand

GaN Power Supply

Minisforum UM580 mini pc is the world’s first mini PC that comes with GaN power supply which is safer, faster and more portable.

One for All: The 60W charger can auto detect the devices and compatible with mainstream charging protocols that can charge for a series of notebooks, for iPhones and Android phones, tablets and more.Perfect for Business Travel: Thanks to GaN tech, the 65W / 100W power adapter is more than 60% smaller than traditional silicone chargers, less bulky to be carried in your pocket.Fast Speed Charging: The USB-C GaN charger delivers up to 93% conversion rate, much higher efficiency than a standard charger.

The Questions and Answers of the UM580 mini pc

Does UM580 come with Windows OS preinstalled?

The UM580 mini pc pre-installs Windows 11 Pro system. If you need any help, please con tact us.

How many monitors does UM580 support?

UM580 can connect with 4 monitors at the same time. HDMI(4K@60Hz) * 2/USB-C Port(4K@60Hz) * 2.

What kind of SSD does UM580 support?

1×2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot (SATA 3.0 6.0Gb/s)

M.2 2280 PCIe SSD (Replace the original one)

Customers who purchase products from Jack’shop store will enjoy the VIP customer treatment at first timing.

【High Performance】 Powered with AMD Ryzen 7 5800H processor. 8 Cores/16 Threads, base clock 3.2 GHz, up to 4.4 GHz. Pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro. UM580 can combine your work and life for efficiency.
【Large Capacity】 Installed dual channel DDR4 16 GB RAM (2 x 8 GB) and can be upgraded to 64 GB. Beside, installed 512 GB M.2 PCIe SSD and can expand the storage via a 2.5 inch SATA HDD slot for your personal needs.
【Dual HDMI+Alt-Mode USB-C】 UM580 mini computer designed with Dual HDMI ports and Dual USB-C (①Display , 4K@60Hz , In Front; ②Alt-Mode , 4K@60Hz , In Back), which allows you to multitasking by connecting to 4 monitors.If the monitor support USB PD (USB Power Delivery), users can use Alt-Mode USB-C port to power the computer and transfer video signal to the monitor at the same time.
【GaN Power Supply】UM580 mini pc is the world’s first mini PC that comes with GaN power supply which is safer, faster and more portable.The USB-C GaN charger delivers up to 93% conversion rate, much higher efficiency than a standard charger. It can be applied to a variety of electronic devices, small and exquisite.
【Strong Connectivity】1 * RJ45 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet Port, 2 * USB 2.0 Port, 2 * USB 3.2 Port(Gen2), 1 * USB-C, 1 * USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C, 1 * USB 3.2 Type-C, 1 * Clear CMOS, 1 * DMIC, 1 * Power Button. Enough to connect different devices to meet different application scenarios. Lifetime technical support and 7/24 customer service. Feel free to message us if you have any questions.

Solar Powered LED Christmas String Lights Outdoor Indoor Decoration

  • Christmas Wide Angle LED String Lights – Light Up Your Life

5MM led string lights surface is wide angle concave lens, with multi-angle light source, more dispersed and clear than other shapes of light, radiating a halo of light in all directions, shining but not too dazzling.

  • Extra Long Christmas String Lights

100Ft extra long outdoor wide angle string lights with 300 high quality LED, mini beads sealed against moisture, eliminate corrosion. Maximize the durability and practicality of the string lights.

  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.
  • Note:
  1. Please turn on the lights when charging and the light will not be on when the solar panel is absorbing solar energy.L
  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

Read more

Commercial Grade 5MM Christmas Lights with Multi-function Remote Control

  • 8 Lighting Modes

Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on. 8 different light modes to create different styles of atmosphere and enjoy a unique light show.

  • Timer Function & Memory Function

Auto charge during the day and light up at night, 24 hours cycle. And with memory function, retain the mode before shutdown, no need to repeat the settings, saving your time and energy.

  • Durable Green Wire

Thicker and more robust than traditional lights wire. Can withstand the wear and tear of indoor or outdoor use.

  • Widely Use – Decorate Your Life

Perfect for Christmas, party, garden, Valentine’s Day, wedding, home, window, bathroom, festival, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building, shopping center etc.

AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX : Powered by the latest AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX Processor(8 Cores, 16 Threads, 16M Cache, up to 4.60GHz), Radeon RX Vega 8 integrated graphics(up to 2100 MHz). 8 cores and 16 threads to divide and conquer multiple tasks at once.
RAM & Storage: 16GB DDR4 3200MHz dual channel RAM(upgradable to 64 GB), 512GB M.2 2280 PCle 3.0 SSD, performed multiple tasks with faster response speed and multi-threaded sensitive response. 2.5 inch SATA HDD Slot x2 for future expansion as your need.
Video Outputs & Liquid Metal Boosts Cooling: With four video output interfaces—HDMI (4K@60Hz) x2, and DisplayPort(4K@60Hz)x2. You can drive four independent 4K 60Hz displays for extreme productivity. Elevates performance with a premium liquid metal compound on the CPU, features direct CPU contact, a wide degree of open ventilation, and a smart fan that efficiently spins up when required to effectively transfer heat directly out the system for quiet and cool performance.
Strong Connectition: 1 x RJ45 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet Port, 5 x USB 3.0 Ports(Gen1) , 1 x USB-C Port, 1 x Clear CMOS , 2 x HDMI Ports, 2 x Display Ports, 2 x MIC, 2 x LINE OUT. WiFi 6, BT 5.1. Enough to connect various devices to meet various application scenarios.
Package & Other Functions: 1x HX90 Mini PC, 1x Mounting Bracket, 1x HDMI Cable, 1x Power Adapter, 1x Instruction Manual. Functions: RTC wake up / Wake on Lan / Auto Power on / Network boot.24/7 Support, professional technical team.

【Efficient Heat Dissipation & WIFI5】Beelink Mini Pc comes with quite large fan and heat sink which can keep the Mini Pc cool and allow the heat to be perfectly dissipated.Built in WIFI 5 (802.11 b/g/n/ac), Bluetooth 4.0.

INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
